code: export default function getToken(hash){var pieces=hash.split('&');var data={};pieces.forEach(function(piece){var parts=piece.split('=');if(parts.length<2){parts.push('');}var name=decodeURIComponent(parts[0]);var value=decodeURIComponent(parts[1]);data[name]=value;});return{accessToken:data['#access_token'],type:data.token_type,expiresIn:Number(data.expires_in)};}
